Key Match Events: Pechenin (18') and Palitsevich (41') scored for Belarus
Pre-Game Insights: Jonathan O'Shea predicts a 0-0 draw between Belarus and Northern Ireland
Northern Ireland are aiming to improve on their performance in the last Nations League, while Belarus are aiming to break new ground on Saturday night
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played behind closed doors due to UEFA restrictions
Belarus will be without injured forward Ivan Bakhar
